Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport.netty.internal

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SecureSMTPClientPipelineFactory
    ChannelPipelineFactory which is used for SMTPS connections
    SecureSMTPClientPipelineFactory.SslHandshakeHandler
    SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler which takes care to call SslHandler.handshake() after the channel is connected
    SMTPClientIdleHandler
    IdleStateAwareChannelUpstreamHandler implementation which will throw an SMTPIdleException if a connection was idle for to long time
    SMTPClientPipelineFactory
    ChannelPipelineFactory which is used for the SMTP Client
    SMTPConnectHandler
    The special thing about this implementation is that I will remove itself from the ChannelPipeline after the first SMTPConnectHandler.messageReceived(ChannelHandlerContext, MessageEvent) was executed.
    SMTPDisconnectHandler
    SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler implementation which will throw an SMTPDisconnectedException if a connection was disconnected unexpectedly.
    SMTPPipeliningRequestEncoder
    OneToOneEncoder which takes care to encode SMTPPipeliningRequest's to ChannelBuffer's
    SMTPRequestEncoder
    OneToOneEncoder which encoded SMTPRequest objects to ChannelBuffer
    SMTPResponseDecoder
    OneToOneDecoder which decodes SMTPResponse's.
